【考法 1】 adj. 例行公事的，敷衍的： characterized by routine or superficiality and often done merely as a duty
【例】 gave his usual perfunctory nod 例行公事地随便点了个头
【近】 automatic, cursory, mechanical, superficial肤浅的
【考法 2】 adj. 不感兴趣的： lacking in interest or enthusiasm
【例】 She gave the list only a perfunctory glance. 她无所谓地随便瞅了名单一眼
【近】 apathetic, casual, disinterested, incurious, indifferent, insouciant, nonchalant, pococurante, unconcerned
【反】 concerned, interested 感兴趣的
【记】 per 不好的，音：破 + function 功能，运行→不好好干，或功能很破
